story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: It all began with that familiar question: "Where’s the after?" It wasn’t just a simple curiosity — it was an essential part of nightlife.
story.paragraph2: The knowledge I learned about security camera systems back in high school blended with the energy of the nights. The first sketches I scribbled in Paint slowly began to come to life after an accident and a long recovery period.
story.paragraph3: Job listings like “looking for a developer” on sahibinden.com, networking with familiar faces, test broadcasts, and a team that never gave up...
story.paragraph4: Because we know this: A true night is never planned, it’s lived.
